title: Honor level get down from level 5 to 4
body: My honor level get down from level 5 to 4 after I finished a game at 22:30. I did not get any bad behavior warning recently. And I heard that in that case the honor level should change to 0. I can always get about 20 honors every week from my teammates. So what happened? {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body:
Weird....I can tell you've got the Honor 5 ward which should mean you were Rank 5 when the season ended. Currently, you're rank 4 with no record of ever being at a different honor rank, which is pretty odd looking at everything else. 

I'm gonna go ahead and create a ticket for you to talk with our game peeps to get this figured out in the best way, and also so that we can track this issue and see exactly what's going on.
It is back to level 5 now!

You mean you are not suppose to drop in honor rank?

I have gone up and down this whole time.

I thought it was like the old one where you had to keep getting honor all the time to keep the level.

I... EMMMM.

Don't know what to say now...

i am having similar issues, i was honor level 5 and now i am honor level 3

i did not see any notifications for any chat restrictions, and i think chat restrictions makes you honor level 1 or 0

i have the honor level 5 ward skin
Mine is back to level 5 now with 2 key fragment!
